blog.name: incorrect-professors
blog.title: incorrect hogwarts professor quotes
blog.description: incorrect quotes (or are they totally correct?) said by the professors of hogwarts school of witchcraft and wizardry. (brought to you by the admins of incorrect-marauders.)

summary:
Dumbledore: Ketchup packets are homophobic! 
McGonagall: Explain? 
Dumbledore: Can't open this bitch.
body:
Dumbledore: Ketchup packets are homophobic! 
McGonagall: Explain? 
Dumbledore: Can't open this bitch.

Love=J K Rowling, Cursed Child, Fantastic Beasts, Drarry, Hinny, Scorbus, Romione, Harry James Potter, Expect meta. Lots and lots of Harry Potter meta. It's a good idea to read my 'about me' before following. Only over 18s, please.

blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

tags: the tales of beedle the bard
summary: I got my hands on The Tales of Beedle the Bard by J.K. Rowling. I saw this on a footnote. This W.A.D.A. may be the proof that...
caption: I got my hands on The Tales of Beedle the Bard by J.K. Rowling. I saw this on a footnote. This W.A.D.A. may be the proof that post-Hogwarts schools exist. Schools for higher education in different fields, maybe universities. Any thoughts ?

reblog.comment: I got my hands on The Tales of Beedle the Bard by J.K. Rowling. I saw this on a footnote. This W.A.D.A. may be the proof that post-Hogwarts schools exist. Schools for higher education in different fields, maybe universities. Any thoughts ?

trail.content_raw: I got my hands on The Tales of Beedle the Bard by J.K. Rowling. I saw this on a footnote. This W.A.D.A. may be the proof that post-Hogwarts schools exist. Schools for higher education in different fields, maybe universities. Any thoughts ?
trail.content: I got my hands on The Tales of Beedle the Bard by J.K. Rowling. I saw this on a footnote. This W.A.D.A. may be the proof that post-Hogwarts schools exist. Schools for higher education in different fields, maybe universities. Any thoughts ?

blog.name: tomarrywritingprompts
blog.title: Tomarry/Harrymort Writing Prompts
blog.description: All Tomarry and Harrymort prompts and inspiration! Anyone is free to use these prompts for their work, and if you do make something, add a link in a reblog! I'll promo it!

summary: Prompt: Royalty AU. Tom and Harry are betrothed as part of a political marriage to bring peace between their warring nations....
body: Prompt: Royalty AU. Tom and Harry are betrothed as part of a political marriage to bring peace between their warring nations. With Harry next in line for the throne, Tom sees it as his only opportunity to rule a kingdom, since as a illegitimate child he doesn’t qualify as an heir. So Tom sets about seducing Harry, so that Harry will do whatever Tom suggests in the name of “love”.

reblog.comment: Prompt: Royalty AU. Tom and Harry are betrothed as part of a political marriage to bring peace between their warring nations. With Harry next in line for the throne, Tom sees it as his only opportunity to rule a kingdom, since as a illegitimate child he doesn’t qualify as an heir. So Tom sets about seducing Harry, so that Harry will do whatever Tom suggests in the name of “love”.

trail.content_raw: Prompt: Royalty AU. Tom and Harry are betrothed as part of a political marriage to bring peace between their warring nations. With Harry next in line for the throne, Tom sees it as his only opportunity to rule a kingdom, since as a illegitimate child he doesn’t qualify as an heir. So Tom sets about seducing Harry, so that Harry will do whatever Tom suggests in the name of “love”.
trail.content: Prompt: Royalty AU. Tom and Harry are betrothed as part of a political marriage to bring peace between their warring nations. With Harry next in line for the throne, Tom sees it as his only opportunity to rule a kingdom, since as a illegitimate child he doesn’t qualify as an heir. So Tom sets about seducing Harry, so that Harry will do whatever Tom suggests in the name of “love”.

summary: When my friend loses me in a crowd:
title: When my friend loses me in a crowd:
body:
Friend: I can’t find her.

Friend: This calls for drastic measures.

Friend: DRACO MALFOY IS EVIL!

-”HE’S JUST MISUNDERSTOOD”-

Friend: Found her.

Masterlist / Guidelines for Requests / Requests and Queries
Ships - Closed / Imagines and Headcanons - Open

title: MASTERLIST

blog.name: timetwistedtale
blog.title: Strange Attractors
blog.description:
a Harry Potter fanfic by Orange et Blue Morality
____________________________________________
Obviously, Harry Potter is not mine (my name is not JK Rowling), and the pictures are definitely not mine either, just borrowing them for a little while. Do credit me for the edits, though.

summary:
Gallus Flint Rosier (OC) // Fifth Year Slytherin // Preserver of Order
Technically, he must exist in some form since there are...
body:
Gallus Flint Rosier (OC) // Fifth Year Slytherin // Preserver of Order

Technically, he must exist in some form since there are descendants of the Rosier family in present-day canon. It’s certainly a Death-Eater leaning family name, hence his automatic presence in Slytherin. His first name, Gallus, is from Latin that meant Rooster.

He has a younger sister and a younger brother. His younger brother, Jonah Rosier, is mentioned in passing sometime earlier when Tom was giving Adrian Smith a first-year Slytherin contact for him. For anyone curious, Jonah actually means Dove. Yes, since JK Rowling seems to follow naming themes for her characters, I try to do that too.

———

credits to handsome Billy Vandendooren
